name: BLADE OF GOD - lite
description:
As an action-adventure game heavily influenced by mythology, Blade of God was developed by PGSOUL Games.
Blade of God focuses on exciting combat and level design, which likes Prince of Persia & God of Wars. During this adventure, you will fight many different enemies, which include : Poseidon, ruler of the ocean; Dracula, the first ancestor of blood; Zeus, lord of Olympia.
Most of the enemies can be finish by QTE.
This version of Blade of God is just a trailer. The full version will be released in 2018.

HONORS
- Tokyo Game Show 2017 Indie Game Area - Be Selected
- 4gamer.net - Indie Prize Nominee (Japan)

GAME FEATRUE
- QTE and the finishing move make intense fight.
- Violent visual: blood, broken bones and limbs!
- Classic combination of light attack and heavy attack
- Hundreds of Ancient gods and giant monsters are waiting for your challenge.
- Using Film vision for mobile game, different visual experience.
- Many effects: screen shock, splashing, and lens blur

If you like our game, feel free to give us your valuable feedback.
